verbose_text: Following stimulation of the HUVECs by IL-1beta (1 ng/mL), TNF-beta (10 ng/mL), TNF-alpha (10 ng/mL), IL-6 (10 ng/mL), IFN-gamma (10 ng/mL), endothelial cell growth supplement (ECGS, 100 mug/mL) and fibronectin (100 ng/mL) for 4 h, expression of CD54, CD62E and CD106 by the HUVECs was significantly up-regulated by IL-1beta, TNF-beta and TNF-alpha respectively (XREF_FIG).
